trans-unit.source: Sorry but there was an issue with the external login process. Please contact an administrator.

trans-unit.source: If you are looking for an account…
trans-unit.target: Se está à procura de uma conta…

trans-unit.source:
Currently this instance doesn't allow for user registration, but you can find an instance that gives you the possibility to sign up for an account and upload your videos there.
Find yours among multiple instances at https://joinpeertube.org/instances.
trans-unit.target: Esta instância não está a aceitar registro de utlizadores de momento, mas pode encontrar uma instância que oferece a possibilidade de registro e poderá fazer o carregamento de seus vídeos aí. Encontre a sua, entre múltiplas instâncias, em https://joinpeertube.org/instances.
Nome de utilizador ou endereço de correio eletrónico

trans-unit.source: Click here to reset your password
trans-unit.target: Clique aqui para redefinir a sua senha

trans-unit.source: We are sorry, you cannot recover your password because your instance administrator did not configure the PeerTube email system.
trans-unit.target: We are sorry, you cannot recover your password because your instance administrator did not configure the PeerTube email system.

trans-unit.source: Send me an email to reset my password
trans-unit.target: Enviar-me uma mensagem para redefinir a minha palavra-passe

trans-unit.source: Upload or import videos, parse logs, prune storage directories, reset user password...
trans-unit.target: Upload or import videos, parse logs, prune storage directories, reset user password...

trans-unit.target: Managing users, following other instances, dealing with spammers...

trans-unit.target: ''Site'' da web Oficial do PeerTube (notícias, apoio, contribuir...): https://joinpeertube.org

trans-unit.source: Put your instance on the public PeerTube index: https://instances.joinpeertube.org/instances
trans-unit.target: Put your instance on the public PeerTube index: https://instances.joinpeertube.org/instances

trans-unit.source: It's time to configure your instance!
trans-unit.target: It's time to configure your instance!

trans-unit.source: Choosing your instance name, setting up a description, specifying who you are, why you created your instance and how long you plan to maintain your it is very important for visitors to understand on what type of instance they are.
trans-unit.target: Choosing your instance name, setting up a description, specifying who you are, why you created your instance and how long you plan to maintain your it is very important for visitors to understand on what type of instance they are.

trans-unit.source: If you want to open registrations, please decide what are your moderation rules, fill your instance terms and specify the categories and languages you speak. This way, you will help users to register on the appropriate PeerTube instance.
trans-unit.target: If you want to open registrations, please decide what are your moderation rules, fill your instance terms and specify the categories and languages you speak. This way, you will help users to register on the appropriate PeerTube instance.

trans-unit.source: You enabled user registration on your instance but did not configure the following fields:
trans-unit.target: You enabled user registration on your instance but did not configure the following fields:

trans-unit.target: How long you plan to maintain your instance

trans-unit.source: How you plan to pay your instance
trans-unit.target: How you plan to pay your instance

trans-unit.source: How you will moderate your instance
trans-unit.target: How you will moderate your instance

trans-unit.source: Please consider configuring these fields to help people to choose the appropriate instance. Without them, your instance may not be referenced on the JoinPeerTube website.
trans-unit.target: Please consider configuring these fields to help people to choose the appropriate instance. Without them, your instance may not be referenced on the JoinPeerTube website.

trans-unit.target: Não voltar a mostrar-me este aviso
Obtenha ajuda para usar o PeerTube

trans-unit.source: Determines whether you can resolve any distant content, or if this instance only allows doing so for instances it follows.
trans-unit.target: Determina se você pode concluir o pedido a qualquer conteúdo distante, ou se esta instância apenas deixa fazê-lo para instâncias seguidas por esta instância.

trans-unit.target: You can import any URL supported by youtube-dl or URL that points to a raw MP4 file. You should make sure you have diffusion rights over the content it points to, otherwise it could cause legal trouble to yourself and your instance.

trans-unit.source:
We recommend you to not use the root user to publish your videos, since it's the super-admin account of your instance.
Instead, create a dedicated account to upload your videos.
trans-unit.target:

trans-unit.target: This instance is dedicated to sensitive or NSFW content

Seu nome de usuário no Twitter

trans-unit.source: If your instance is explicitly allowed by Twitter, a video player will be embedded in the Twitter feed on PeerTube video share. If the instance is not, we use an image link card that will redirect on your PeerTube instance. Check this checkbox, save the configuration and test with a video URL of your instance (https://example.com/videos/watch/blabla) on https://cards-dev.twitter.com/validator to see if you instance is allowed.
trans-unit.target: If your instance is explicitly allowed by Twitter, a video player will be embedded in the Twitter feed on PeerTube video share. If the instance is not, we use an image link card that will redirect on your PeerTube instance. Check this checkbox, save the configuration and test with a video URL of your instance (https://example.com/videos/watch/blabla) on https://cards-dev.twitter.com/validator to see if you instance is allowed.

trans-unit.source: Process uploaded videos so that they are in a streamable form that any device can play. Though costly in resources, this is a critical part of PeerTube, so tread carefully.
trans-unit.target: Process uploaded videos so that they are in a streamable form that any device can play. Though costly in resources, this is a critical part of PeerTube, so tread carefully.

trans-unit.source: If you disable transcoding, many videos from your users will not work!
trans-unit.target: Se você desativar a transcodificação, muitos vídeos dos seus usuários não funcionarão!

trans-unit.source: Allows users to upload .mkv, .mov, .avi and .flv videos.
trans-unit.target: Allows users to upload .mkv, .mov, .avi and .flv videos.

trans-unit.source: Allows users to upload audio files that will be merged with the preview file on upload.
trans-unit.target: Allows users to upload audio files that will be merged with the preview file on upload.

trans-unit.source:
Experimental, we suggest you to not disable webtorrent support for now
If you also enabled HLS support, it will multiply videos storage by 2
If disabled, breaks federation with PeerTube instances < 2.1
trans-unit.target:
Experimental, we suggest you to not disable webtorrent support for now
If you also enabled HLS support, it will multiply videos storage by 2
If disabled, breaks federation with PeerTube instances < 2.1

trans-unit.source:
Requires ffmpeg >= 4.1
Generate HLS playlists and fragmented MP4 files resulting in a better playback than with the current default player:
Resolution change is smoother Faster playback in particular with long videos More stable playback (less bugs/infinite loading)
If you also enabled WebTorrent support, it will multiply videos storage by 2
trans-unit.target:
Requires ffmpeg >= 4.1
Generate HLS playlists and fragmented MP4 files resulting in a better playback than with the current default player:
Resolution change is smoother Faster playback in particular with long videos More stable playback (less bugs/infinite loading)
If you also enabled WebTorrent support, it will multiply videos storage by 2

trans-unit.source: Some files are not federated, and fetched when necessary. Define their caching policies.
trans-unit.target: Some files are not federated, and fetched when necessary. Define their caching policies.

trans-unit.target: Number of previews to keep in cache

trans-unit.source: Number of video captions to keep in cache
trans-unit.target: Number of video captions to keep in cache

trans-unit.target: Slight modifications to your PeerTube instance for when creating a plugin or theme is overkill.

trans-unit.target: Write JavaScript code directly.Example: console.log('my instance is amazing');

trans-unit.target: It seems like the configuration is invalid. Please search for potential errors in the different tabs.

trans-unit.source: PeerTube is a self-hosted ActivityPub-federated video streaming platform using P2P directly in your web browser.
trans-unit.target: PeerTube is a self-hosted ActivityPub-federated video streaming platform using P2P directly in your web browser.

trans-unit.source: It is a free and open-source software, under the AGPLv3 licence.
trans-unit.target: It is a free and open-source software, under the AGPLv3 licence.

trans-unit.source: For more information, please visit joinpeertube.org.
trans-unit.target: For more information, please visit joinpeertube.org.

trans-unit.source: Discover how to setup your account, what is a channel, how to create a playlist and more!
trans-unit.target: Discover how to setup your account, what is a channel, how to create a playlist and more!

trans-unit.source: Discover unofficial Android applications or browser addons!
trans-unit.target: Discover unofficial Android applications or browser addons!

trans-unit.source: Want to help to improve PeerTube? You can translate the web interface, give your feedback or directly contribute to the code!
trans-unit.target: Want to help to improve PeerTube? You can translate the web interface, give your feedback or directly contribute to the code!

trans-unit.source: PeerTube uses the BitTorrent protocol to share bandwidth between users by default to help lower the load on the server, but ultimately leaves you the choice to switch back to regular streaming exclusively from the server of the video. What follows applies only if you want to keep using the P2P mode of PeerTube.
trans-unit.target: PeerTube uses the BitTorrent protocol to share bandwidth between users by default to help lower the load on the server, but ultimately leaves you the choice to switch back to regular streaming exclusively from the server of the video. What follows applies only if you want to keep using the P2P mode of PeerTube.

trans-unit.source: In theory, someone with enough technical skills could create a script that tracks which IP is downloading which video. In practice, this is much more difficult because:
trans-unit.target: In theory, someone with enough technical skills could create a script that tracks which IP is downloading which video. In practice, this is much more difficult because:

trans-unit.source: An HTTP request has to be sent on each tracker for each video to spy. If we want to spy all PeerTube's videos, we have to send as many requests as there are videos (so potentially a lot)
trans-unit.target: An HTTP request has to be sent on each tracker for each video to spy. If we want to spy all PeerTube's videos, we have to send as many requests as there are videos (so potentially a lot)

trans-unit.source: For each request sent, the tracker returns random peers at a limited number. For instance, if there are 1000 peers in the swarm and the tracker sends only 20 peers for each request, there must be at least 50 requests sent to know every peer in the swarm
trans-unit.target: For each request sent, the tracker returns random peers at a limited number. For instance, if there are 1000 peers in the swarm and the tracker sends only 20 peers for each request, there must be at least 50 requests sent to know every peer in the swarm

trans-unit.source: Those requests have to be sent regularly to know who starts/stops watching a video. It is easy to detect that kind of behaviour
trans-unit.target: Those requests have to be sent regularly to know who starts/stops watching a video. It is easy to detect that kind of behaviour

trans-unit.source: If an IP address is stored in the tracker, it doesn't mean that the person behind the IP (if this person exists) has watched the video
trans-unit.target: If an IP address is stored in the tracker, it doesn't mean that the person behind the IP (if this person exists) has watched the video

trans-unit.source: The IP address is a vague information: usually, it regularly changes and can represent many persons or entities
trans-unit.target: The IP address is a vague information: usually, it regularly changes and can represent many persons or entities

trans-unit.source: Web peers are not publicly accessible: because we use WebRTC inside the web browser (with the WebTorrent library), the protocol is different from classic BitTorrent. When you are in a web browser, you send a signal containing your IP address to the tracker that will randomly choose other peers to forward the information to. See this document for more information
trans-unit.target: Web peers are not publicly accessible: because we use WebRTC inside the web browser (with the WebTorrent library), the protocol is different from classic BitTorrent. When you are in a web browser, you send a signal containing your IP address to the tracker that will randomly choose other peers to forward the information to. See this document for more information

trans-unit.source: The worst-case scenario of an average person spying on their friends is quite unlikely. There are much more effective ways to get that kind of information.
trans-unit.target: The worst-case scenario of an average person spying on their friends is quite unlikely. There are much more effective ways to get that kind of information.

trans-unit.source: How does PeerTube compare with YouTube?
trans-unit.target: Como o PeerTube se compara com o YouTube?

trans-unit.source: The threats to privacy with YouTube are different from PeerTube's. In YouTube's case, the platform gathers a huge amount of your personal information (not only your IP) to analyze them and track you. Moreover, YouTube is owned by Google/Alphabet, a company that tracks you across many websites (via AdSense or Google Analytics).
trans-unit.target: The threats to privacy with YouTube are different from PeerTube's. In YouTube's case, the platform gathers a huge amount of your personal information (not only your IP) to analyze them and track you. Moreover, YouTube is owned by Google/Alphabet, a company that tracks you across many websites (via AdSense or Google Analytics).

trans-unit.source: What can I do to limit the exposure of my IP address?
trans-unit.target: O que eu posso fazer para restringir a exposição do meu endereço IP?

trans-unit.source: Your IP address is public so every time you consult a website, there is a number of actors (in addition to the final website) seeing your IP in their connection logs: ISP/routers/trackers/CDN and more. PeerTube is transparent about it: we warn you that if you want to keep your IP private, you must use a VPN or Tor Browser. Thinking that removing P2P from PeerTube will give you back anonymity doesn't make sense.
trans-unit.target: Your IP address is public so every time you consult a website, there is a number of actors (in addition to the final website) seeing your IP in their connection logs: ISP/routers/trackers/CDN and more. PeerTube is transparent about it: we warn you that if you want to keep your IP private, you must use a VPN or Tor Browser. Thinking that removing P2P from PeerTube will give you back anonymity doesn't make sense.

trans-unit.source: What will be done to mitigate this problem?
trans-unit.target: O que será feito para mitigar o problema?

trans-unit.source: PeerTube wants to deliver the best countermeasures possible, to give you more choice and render attacks less likely. Here is what we put in place so far:
trans-unit.target: PeerTube wants to deliver the best countermeasures possible, to give you more choice and render attacks less likely. Here is what we put in place so far:

trans-unit.source: We set a limit to the number of peers sent by the tracker
trans-unit.target: We set a limit to the number of peers sent by the tracker

trans-unit.source: We set a limit on the request frequency received by the tracker
trans-unit.target: We set a limit on the request frequency received by the tracker

trans-unit.source: Allow instance admins to disable P2P from the administration interface
trans-unit.target: Allow instance admins to disable P2P from the administration interface

trans-unit.source: Automatic video redundancy from some instances: one doesn't know if the IP downloaded the video on purpose or if it a server
trans-unit.target: Automatic video redundancy from some instances: one doesn't know if the IP downloaded the video on purpose or if it a server

trans-unit.source: Ultimately, remember you can always disable P2P by toggling it in the video player, or just by disabling WebRTC in your browser.
trans-unit.target: Ultimately, remember you can always disable P2P by toggling it in the video player, or just by disabling WebRTC in your browser.

trans-unit.source: This instance does not have instances followers.
trans-unit.target: This instance does not have instances followers.

trans-unit.source: This instance does not have instances followings.
trans-unit.target: This instance does not have instances followings.

trans-unit.source: How long do we plan to maintain this instance?
trans-unit.target: How long do we plan to maintain this instance?

trans-unit.source: How will we finance this instance?
trans-unit.target: How will we finance this instance?

trans-unit.source: A channel is an entity in which you upload your videos. Creating several of them helps you to organize and separate your content. For example, you could decide to have a channel to publish your piano concerts, and another channel in which you publish your videos talking about ecology.
trans-unit.target: A channel is an entity in which you upload your videos. Creating several of them helps you to organize and separate your content. For example, you could decide to have a channel to publish your piano concerts, and another channel in which you publish your videos talking about ecology.

trans-unit.source: Other users can decide to subscribe any channel they want, to be notified when you publish a new video.
trans-unit.target: Other users can decide to subscribe any channel they want, to be notified when you publish a new video.

trans-unit.source: The channel name is a unique identifier of your channel on this and all the other instances. It's as unique as an email address, which makes it easy for other people to interact with it.
trans-unit.target: The channel name is a unique identifier of your channel on this and all the other instances. It's as unique as an email address, which makes it easy for other people to interact with it.

trans-unit.source: Channel name cannot be the same than your account name. You can click on the first step to update your account name.
trans-unit.target: Channel name cannot be the same than your account name. You can click on the first step to update your account name.

trans-unit.source: The username is a unique identifier of your account on this and all the other instances. It's as unique as an email address, which makes it easy for other people to interact with it.
trans-unit.target: The username is a unique identifier of your account on this and all the other instances. It's as unique as an email address, which makes it easy for other people to interact with it.

trans-unit.source: Contains offensive, violent, or coarse language or iconography.
trans-unit.target: Contains offensive, violent, or coarse language or iconography.

trans-unit.source: Contains abusive, racist or sexist language or iconography.
trans-unit.target: Contains abusive, racist or sexist language or iconography.

trans-unit.source: Contains marketing, spam, purposefully deceitful news, or otherwise misleading thumbnail/text/tags. Please provide reputable sources to report hoaxes.
trans-unit.target: Contains marketing, spam, purposefully deceitful news, or otherwise misleading thumbnail/text/tags. Please provide reputable sources to report hoaxes.

trans-unit.source: Contains personal information that could be used to track, identify, contact or impersonate someone (e.g. name, address, phone number, email, or credit card details).
trans-unit.target: Contains personal information that could be used to track, identify, contact or impersonate someone (e.g. name, address, phone number, email, or credit card details).

trans-unit.source: Infringes your copyright wrt. the regional laws with which the server must comply.
trans-unit.target: Infringes your copyright wrt. the regional laws with which the server must comply.

trans-unit.source: Anything not included in the above that breaks the terms of service, code of conduct, or general rules in place on the server.
trans-unit.target: Anything not included in the above that breaks the terms of service, code of conduct, or general rules in place on the server.

trans-unit.source: The above can only be seen in thumbnails.
trans-unit.target: The above can only be seen in thumbnails.

trans-unit.source: The above can only be seen in captions (please describe which).
trans-unit.target: The above can only be seen in captions (please describe which).

trans-unit.source: Request is too large for the server. Please contact you administrator if you want to increase the limit size.
trans-unit.target: A solicitação é grande demais para o servidor. Entre em contato com seu administrador se quiser aumentar o tamanho do limite.

trans-unit.source: Too many attempts, please try again after minutes.
trans-unit.target: Muitas tentativas, por favor tente novamente depois de minutos.

trans-unit.source: Too many attempts, please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Muitas tentativas, por favor tente novamente depois.
Erro de servidor. Por favor, tente novamente depois.

trans-unit.source: Subscribed to all current channels of . You will be notified of all their new videos.

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to delete this comment?
trans-unit.target: Do you really want to delete this comment?

trans-unit.source: Do you really want to delete this video?
trans-unit.target: Você realmente deseja excluir esse vídeo?

trans-unit.source: This video will be duplicated by your instance.
trans-unit.target: This video will be duplicated by your instance.

trans-unit.source: Only I can see this video
trans-unit.target: Apenas eu posso ver este vídeo

Qualquer um pode ver este vídeo

trans-unit.source: Only users of this instance can see this video
trans-unit.target: Only users of this instance can see this video

trans-unit.source: Your video was uploaded to your account and is private.
trans-unit.target: Seu vídeo foi enviado para sua conta e é privado.

trans-unit.source: But associated data (tags, description...) will be lost, are you sure you want to leave this page?
trans-unit.target: Mas dados associados (tags, descrição…) serão perdidas, tem certeza que deseja sair dessa página?

trans-unit.source: Your video is not uploaded yet, are you sure you want to leave this page?
trans-unit.target: Seu vídeo ainda não foi atualizado, você tem certeza que deseja sair dessa página?

trans-unit.source: Your video quota is exceeded with this video (video size: , used: , quota: )
trans-unit.target: Sua quota de vídeos é excedida com este vídeo (tamanho do vídeo: , utilizado: , quota: )

trans-unit.source: Your daily video quota is exceeded with this video (video size: , used: , quota: )
trans-unit.target: Sua quota diária de vídeos é excedida com este vídeo (tamanho do vídeo: , utilizado: , quota: )

trans-unit.source: You have unsaved changes! If you leave, your changes will be lost.
trans-unit.target: You have unsaved changes! If you leave, your changes will be lost.

trans-unit.source: The deletion will be sent to remote instances so they can reflect the change.
trans-unit.target: The deletion will be sent to remote instances so they can reflect the change.

trans-unit.source: It is a remote comment, so the deletion will only be effective on your instance.
trans-unit.target: It is a remote comment, so the deletion will only be effective on your instance.

trans-unit.source: You need to be connected to rate this content.
trans-unit.target: You need to be connected to rate this content.

trans-unit.source: This video contains mature or explicit content. Are you sure you want to watch it?
trans-unit.target: Este vídeo possui conteúdo adulto ou explícito. Você tem certeza que deseja assisti-lo?

trans-unit.source: Skip to a percentage of the video: 0 is 0% and 9 is 90% (requires player focus)
trans-unit.target: Skip to a percentage of the video: 0 is 0% and 9 is 90% (requires player focus)

trans-unit.target: When active, the next video is automatically played after the current one.

trans-unit.source: Videos that have the higher number of likes.
trans-unit.target: Videos that have the higher number of likes.
